Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The ceiling above is painted in an array of dark grey tones to represent a tempest-tossed sky, the muted color palette of neutrals carried through in the umbral grey tones of the upholstered couches and chaise lounges that are arranged around small side tables on the dark charcoal carpeted floor underfoot. In stark contrast, the raised semicircular stage that stands against the southern wall is awash in pale cream colors to allow light to reflect from the massive chandelier and multiple sconces arranged around the performance area. This wealth of light draws the eye to an elaborately embroidered tapestry that covers the entire length of the southern wall in a detail scene of a Tuscan landscape, the colors bright against the otherwise muted palette of the room.

The ceiling above is painted in an array of dark grey tones to represent a tempest-tossed sky, the muted color palette of neutrals carried through in the umbral grey tones of the upholstered couches and chaise lounges that are arranged around small side tables on the dark charcoal carpeted floor underfoot. In stark contrast, the raised semicircular stage that stands against the southern wall is awash in pale cream colors to allow light to reflect from the massive chandelier and multiple sconces arranged around the performance area. This wealth of light draws the eye to an elaborately embroidered tapestry that covers the entire length of the southern wall in a detail scene of a Tuscan landscape, the colors bright against the otherwise muted palette of the room.

The ceiling above is painted in an array of dark grey tones to represent a tempest-tossed sky, the muted color palette of neutrals carried through in the umbral grey tones of the upholstered couches and chaise lounges that are arranged around small side tables on the dark charcoal carpeted floor underfoot. In stark contrast, the raised semicircular stage that stands against the southern wall is awash in pale cream colors to allow light to reflect from the massive chandelier and multiple sconces arranged around the performance area. This wealth of light draws the eye to an elaborately embroidered tapestry that covers the entire length of the southern wall in a detail scene of a Tuscan landscape, the colors bright against the otherwise muted palette of the room.
an arched double door leading northeast

Each side of the arched double door leading to the northeast is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading southeast

Each side of the arched double door leading to the southeast is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading west

Each side of the arched double door leading to the west is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
